message: The alley opens onto a fountain surrounded by some benches.
There's a lump sitting in front of the fountain.
...I know instantly that it's Clear.
Worried he might run again, I approach slowly.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Clear."
He twitches, making his silver hair sway.
His hair is wet. He must've dunked his head in the water.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey... Is, uh, your face okay? Did you wash it all off? There was so much smoke, I was really worried..."

name: クリア
message: "I just washed it off. I'm fine now."
Clear answers without looking at me.
I crouch down and try to get a better look at him. He still has the gas mask on.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why won't you look at me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you really okay? It doesn't hurt?"

name: クリア
message: "No. It doesn't hurt."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why won't you take off your mask? You need to make sure you get all of it."

name: クリア
message: "I'm fine. I'll wash it later."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Later?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes."
...He really is acting weird.
You just had enough acid poured on your head to make it smoke. How can you possibly be okay after just rinsing it off a little?

name: 蒼葉
message: "You aren't just pretending you're okay, right?"

name: クリア
message: "I am not."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then why don't you just wash your face right now?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear..."

name: クリア
message: "I was told that I should never remove my mask."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Who told you that?"

name: クリア
message: "My grandpa."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Your grandpa... The nice old man you used to live with?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why did he tell you that?"
For several seconds, I hear nothing but the fountain and the distant music from the street.

name: クリア
message: "...Grandpa said I was different."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Different?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. He said my face was different, so I must never let people see it. I'm sure I must look horribly strange."

name: クリア
message: "Like a monster, just like those people said. I'm not normal. So..."

name: クリア
message: "Please, Master. Please don't look at my face. I don't want you to hate me. I can't lose you. Please don't make me show you."
I gently put my hand on his shoulder. His whole body jumps.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm not gonna hate you, no matter what your face looks like."

name: クリア
message: "...How can you say that?"

name: クリア
message: "You've never seen my face, Master. You can't know if it'll make you hate me or not."
Clear's voice is hard as ice, and as brittle.

name: クリア
message: "How can you be sure? Even if you are my master, that's the one thing I won't do. I can't."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sure, I haven't seen your face before, but let me ask you this. I've been with you this whole time without ever seeing your face."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I already know what kind of person you are. So how could seeing your face―whatever it looks like―make me hate you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're a weirdo, and I can never tell if you're playing dumb or what, but I wouldn't say I hate that about you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So even if your face is different, you're still the same Clear. I have no reason to hate you."
Clear seems to hesitate, then turns to face me just a little.

name: クリア
message: "...Are you telling the truth?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: クリア
message: "Are you sure you won't hate me, no matter what face I have?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Of course I won't."

name: クリア
message: "...Can I trust you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
I lean over to look into Clear's face. I can see his eyes staring back at me through the mask.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm your master, right?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then trust me. Pretty sad if you can't even trust your master, right?"
Clear says nothing for a moment, then slowly turns the rest of the way toward me.

name: クリア
message: "...Okay. I'll trust you, Master."
With a soft, nervous whisper, he reaches for his mask.
His white-gloved fingers are trembling slightly.

name: クリア
message: "You really won't hate me, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I won't."

name: クリア
message: "...Okay."
A hint of resolve has entered his voice. Slowly, Clear removes his mask.
